name: Suspicious Steak Tartare
desc: A dish of fresh meat that is served raw. The minced meat, which is rusty red and faintly sour, gives off an ominous aura. This dish doesn't seem suitable for human consumption. Hmmm... You probably shouldn't feed it to a security meka either, right?

customize.name: Recipe: Steak Tartare
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Steak Tartare.

customize.name: Steak Tartare
customize.desc: A dish of fresh raw meat. Choice meat that has been minced and seasoned goes perfectly well with raw egg yolk. It is unknown who came up with the idea. It might be a starving adventurer's desperate attempt at keeping their belly full.

customize.name: Delicious Steak Tartare
customize.desc: A fresh dish of raw meat. Tender meat that is minced properly and coated with egg yolk that tastes exceptionally juicy and sweet. The aromatic juice of the meat fills your mouth with euphoria, giving people an exceptionally pure and primitive gourmet delight.

customize.name: Suspicious Steak Tartare
customize.desc: A dish of fresh meat that is served raw. The minced meat, which is rusty red and faintly sour, gives off an ominous aura. This dish doesn't seem suitable for human consumption. Hmmm... You probably shouldn't feed it to a security meka either, right?

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

value.text: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.
